sentences.en: Could I have tuna instead of ham?
sentences.cn: 我可否要金枪鱼来代替火腿？

sentences.en: Geoff didn’t study law. Instead, he decided to become an actor.
sentences.cn: 杰夫没学法律，相反，他决定当演员。

sentences.en: He builds furniture using wooden pegs instead of nails.
sentences.cn: 他用木楔子取代钉子制作家具。

sentences.en: He crossed out "fellow subjects", and instead inserted "fellow citizens".
sentences.cn: 他删掉fellowsubjects，插入替换词fellowcitizens。

sentences.en: He crossed out "Screenplay" and put "Written by" instead.
sentences.cn: 他划掉了“编剧”二字，改为“作者”。

sentences.en: If Jo can’t attend the meeting, I could go instead.
sentences.cn: 如果乔不能去开会，我可以代他去。

sentences.en: If you do yearn for chocolate, try a carob bar instead.
sentences.cn: 你要是非常想吃巧克力，那就嚼根角豆条解馋吧。

sentences.en: Instead of being annoyed, he seemed quite pleased.
sentences.cn: 他没有生气，反而似乎很高兴。

sentences.en: Instead of being disappointed at where you are, think optimistically about where you are going.
sentences.cn: 与其对你现在所处的位置感到失望，不如乐观地想想你前进的方向。

sentences.en: Instead of complaining about what's wrong, be grateful for what's right.
sentences.cn: 别抱怨不好的事，要对好的事心存感恩。

sentences.en: Instead of moving at his usual stately pace, he was almost running.
sentences.cn: 他没像平时那样优雅庄重地走着，而是几乎跑了起来。

sentences.en: Instead of rushing at life, I wanted something more meaningful.
sentences.cn: 我不想混日子，我想做点更有意义的事情。

sentences.en: Instead of snacking on crisps and chocolate, nibble on celery or carrot.
sentences.cn: 不要把薯片和巧克力当零食来吃，要吃些芹菜和胡萝卜。

sentences.en: Instead, she set her jaw grimly and waited in silence.
sentences.cn: 相反，她一脸严肃，面部紧绷，一声不吭地等着。

sentences.en: Small pickling onions can be used instead of sliced ones.
sentences.cn: 小块腌洋葱可用来替代切片洋葱。

sentences.en: So instead I suggested taking her out to dinner for a change.
sentences.cn: 于是我又提议，带她出去吃饭换换口味。

sentences.en: Water companies should concentrate on reducing waste instead of building new reservoirs.
sentences.cn: 自来水公司应该集中精力减少水浪费，而不是修建新水库。

sentences.en: We did the logo in lower-case letters instead of capitals.
sentences.cn: 我们的徽标用了小写字母，没用大写。

sentences.en: When we feel anger, we bury the emotion and feel guilty instead.
sentences.cn: 当我们感到愤怒时，压抑这种情绪反而会觉得内疚。

sentences.en: You probably picked up my keys instead of yours.
sentences.cn: 你可能没拿你的钥匙而错拿了我的。

trans.tran_en: used to say what is not used, does not happen etc, when something else is used, happens etc
